text: showed up here on a saturday evening looking forward to live tunes at 9pm however an hour elapsed and still no live entertainment took place the fare provided is merely subpar at its finest forego this joint and check out boardwalk billies right around the bend for a superior return on your investment
awful experience  the bin wasnt emptied there was a lack of windshield cleanser and an antiquated squeegee

i visited this place for a midday meal enjoyed a chilled blue moon from the tap and proceeded to indulge in a delectable seafood taco and caesar salad combination the salad was amazing and the tacos might be the finest ive ever tasted – far from being ordinary street food these were truly sophisticated highend flavors ill definitely return
this 50sstyle home turned local eatery known as the gilbert house provides excellent cinnamon rolls coffee and green chile omelets all complemented by the cozy atmosphere and swift affable service

at this establishment i opted for a refreshing draft blue moon for lunch and decided on their marineinspired taco and caesar salad duo the salad was impressive and without a doubt the best gourmettype tacos ive ever tried – not your usual streetlevel servings but rather refined upscale deliciousness i plan on returning for sure

the stunning facility features wellcoordinated and efficiently managed cep horse shows with the superb equidome offering multiple arenas including one indoor area as well as two more enclosed barns which are kept spotless

while a fine restaurant it didnt live up to what i had hoped selecting a steak from delmonico is more advantageous at this accommodation the dishes were passable yet their exorbitant pricing and inability to outshine dolminicos render my preference pretty straightforward
uninspiring and monotonous delayed attention opting for pastamore at the marché is a better choice

craving nothing more than a piping hot beverage of green tea paired with the sight of falling rain nestled in a tranquil corner distant from all the commotion at the mall as we were seated facing the lively strip

at this establishment i enjoyed a refreshing blue moon straight from the tap for lunch followed by a delicious fish taco and caesar salad pairing to my delight the scrumptious salad accompanied what might have been the finest fish tacos ive encountered yet these gourmet tacos boast elegance and superior quality compared to their commonplace counterparts found on the streets rest assured i will revisit in the future

a genuine motorcycle enthusiasts haven i wasnt actually one myself and felt out of place however riding as a passenger on my friends bike and arriving there seemed cool the outdoor atmosphere allowed everyone to smoke enjoy themselves and the drinks were nice too i had a sandwich that was quite decent as well
the gilbert house a charming local restaurant housed in a 50sstyle converted home offers delicious cinnamon rolls coffee and green chile omelets with speedy and welcoming service

i must express my immense gratitude to tracy and rip for assisting me in securing financing and locating the ideal vehicle for my needs i adore my new automobile and i extend my sincerest thanks to the fantastic team at earnhardt buick gmc

upon entering one is immediately greeted by the delightful scent of fresh baked goods with my personal favorites being 1 the egg pizza 2 the red velvet bagel 3 the pbj brioche and 4 the utah peach tart this spot has surely earned its position as my new goto morning haunt

with the launch of this business im genuinely ecstatic some establishments in the valley tend to be hitandmiss however i must convey that this particular one was impressive the spam musubi along with the hamburger steak plate lunch were truly enjoyable and its comforting knowing theres now an option like this situated on the west end of town within summerlin this spot will surely see me as a consistent visitor
i believe its the moment for america to eliminate walmarts
hurry and try this concealed treasure located in the middle the personnel are incredibly kind and polite the cuisine is scrumptious and i think they serve cocktails too
dull and uninteresting sluggish service it would be wiser to visit pastamore in the marché

wow this barerrr convenience store is popping on friday nights  i just stopped by for a quick break on a bike ride so i didnt get to thoroughly assess this location   it has a really cool courtyard that is a great place to hang out in the evening  ill have to update my review when i get to see more

an agreeable food joint nonetheless it doesnt live up to my standards delmonico comes out on top when choosing a carnivorous delight at this location acceptable albeit overpriced fare led me to find no difficulty in opting for dolminicos offerings instead

travis and team were very professional and easy to work with  we had our exterior house painted and are very pleased with the finished product  we will definitely hire gilberts painting in future for inside work

the instant you set foot in this establishment your nostrils are filled with the enticing fragrance of justbaked items i particularly recommend trying the following 1 their egg pizza 2 the red velvet bagel 3 a pbj brioche and 4 the utah peach tart its safe to say that this venue has captured my loyalty as my preferred breakfast location

in spite of having friendly staff members the constricted variety in sizes and disorganized display of items at this locale doesnt leave much of an impression on me – enough to make me reconsider revisiting
i have been to this location twice and the only consistent thing is rude staff who apparently are not trained in customer service skills the potato soup was ok

merging korean and mexican elements into a scrumptious korean burrito is a wonderful concept and it pairs beautifully with the equally mouthwatering korean tacos regrettably after several experiences at this venue the quality of service remains lackluster mainly due to the unwelcoming approach from the waitresses and proprietors hence they get just three stars from me

despite high expectations for curry garden as it came recommended by frequent dining partners both my family and i quickly became disenchanted upon seeing the uncleanliness in the kitchen – it was quite disappointing to say the least
having been to this spot two times the persistent issue seems to be impolite personnel who evidently arent proficient in handling customers well however the potato soup was satisfactory

swiftly discover this secret wonder set amidst the center the employees are genuinely warm and respectful their culinary creations are delectable and it seems they also have a range of cocktails available
the worst fills over been to trash was not emptied windshield cleaner was out  squeegee was old  terrible

came here on a saturday night supposed to be live music at 9pm an hr later still no live music the food is mediocre at best by pass this place and go to boardwalk billies around the corner much better bang for your buck

we decided to use a groupon offer for a meal at hussongs and though the customer care was topnotch the culinary aspect left much to be desired—especially their chips it could suffice if one doesnt know what true mexican flavors are but those searching for an authentic taste should look elsewhere
when theres no other choice ill have a meal here – its neither remarkable nor dreadfully bad

my spouse and i had a buy one get one free voucher but were hesitant to dine here due to the reviews however the breakfast for two cost just 431 offering pancakes eggs blintzes and more it was sufficient for us and i would definitely visit again give it a try with an unbiased perspective
if necessary ill consume food here – its not exceptional but not extremely awful either

my wife and i went to sea saw for a valentines celebration but the setting lacked charm the meals were unimpressive and the fees were outrageous the assistance provided was passable but in general the entire encounter was highly disillusioning

i must express my immense gratitude to tracy and rip as they were instrumental in assisting me with obtaining financing and locating the perfect vehicle for me i absolutely adore my new automobile a massive thank you goes out to the amazing team at earnhardt buick gmc

fantastic concept for a koreanmexican mix  the korean burrito is delicious as are the korean tacos i rated them 3 stars due to their average service ive visited this place on numerous occasions and am constantly underwhelmed by the attitude of the waitstaffowner

i have to give a big shout out to tracy and rip  they helped me get financed and find the perfect car for me  i love my new car  thank you thank you thank you to the wonderful team at earnhardt buick gmc

attractively designed the equidomes cep horse shows stand out for being highly organized and efficiently operated there are numerous arenas present one of which is indoors and two other enclosed spaces all the barns can be praised for their tidiness

after visiting the hot springs we decided to grab some food at 21214 to put it simply it was revolting the table had a sticky surface the windows were unclean and stains covered the walls it was an extremely unpleasant experience this used to be a pleasant spot for some decent truckstop cuisine however we wont be returning due to the deterioration of standards

to summarize a lengthy experience i will definitely search for another coffee shop next time due to terrible customer service while the barista was amicable the supervisor who i believe has short blonde hair displayed a significant attitude issue
the dull and tasteless sluggish service is not recommended you might prefer visiting pastamore in marché

charming little place providing typical dishes along with exceptional service staff and a warm setting to lure you inside curiously nobody there needed a menu as each person was acknowledged by their first name and questioned about their routine order – it unquestionably has a familial feel to it
spacious shop impressive variety and not overcrowded making it convenient to locate an associate for inquiries

arrived at this location on saturday evening expecting live music at 9pm but even an hour later there was none the food is just average at best i would recommend skipping this spot and heading to boardwalk billies nearby for a greater value for your money

an enjoyable little spot featuring standard meals but the impressive service and warm surroundings attract visitors i saw how patrons didnt even need a menu because they were called by their names and asked if they wanted their habitual dishes – undeniably exuding a familial essence

the idea of blending korean and mexican cuisine is brilliant – the taste of the korean burrito and korean tacos is outstanding however i can only give them a 3star rating because of their mediocre customer service after going there multiple times the demeanor of the serverproprietor never ceases to disappoint me

i cant believe how lively this convenience store is on friday nights i only visited briefly during a bike ride so i couldnt fully evaluate the location however the awesome courtyard seems like a perfect spot to chill during the evening hours ill need to update my review once ive seen more

i recently visited this place and im thrilled to say its a great one the success of businesses in the valley can be unpredictable but this specific establishment has done well i enjoyed the spam musubi and hamburger steak plate lunch and am relieved that such an eatery is now available on the summerlins west side ill definitely be a regular here

visited this venue on a saturday night with the anticipation of enjoying live music starting at 9pm yet after waiting an additional hour there was still no performance the cuisine is only passable at best bypass this establishment and try boardwalk billies just around the corner for a muchimproved experience and costeffectiveness

a great tiny gem with average cuisine however the excellent servers and pleasant ambience make it appealing it caught my eye that everyone was addressed by their names and their usual orders were known – certainly had a strong feeling of being like family

it was an atrocious situation with the garbage not taken out an empty windshield cleaner and an ancient squeegee

youd find more satisfaction at pastamore within the marché given the insipid and slow assistance present

the customer service employees here genuinely want to assist you i was searching for a rare triwing screwdriver and i think her name is maria  she tracked down someone who might know its location and quickly responded to me i would definitely shop here again

travis and his team demonstrated exceptional professionalism and were a breeze to collaborate with we had the exterior of our home painted and are thrilled with the final outcome in the future we will surely employ gilberts painting for interior projects

great cinnamon rolls  coffee and green chile omelet service is friendly and quick the restaurant is quaint and just what they call it the gilbert house its a 50s style home converted to a very nice local restaurant

horrible customer service  to make a long story shorti will go out of my way to find a different coffee place next time  the barista was friendly but the supervisor i think with short blond hair has a bit of an attitude problem

boasting a highly appealing structure this venue ensures smooth and orderly cep horse shows take place complimented by the impressive equidome showcasing several arenas – one indoors and another couple providing sheltered barns that remain impeccably clean

a brilliant fusion of korean and mexican flavors is showcased in their delicious korean burrito which goes well with their tasty korean tacos unfortunately the soso customer service and the attitude of the waitress and owner warrant only a threestar rating despite my numerous visits
spacious shop wide variety of items not overcrowded making it simple to locate an employee for inquiries

its amazing to see the barerrr convenience store so bustling on a friday night  i swung by briefly while cycling and didnt have the chance to thoroughly check out the location the fantastic courtyard is definitely a terrific spot to spend time in at nighttime i should revise my review once i explore further

as someone who doesnt really identify as a true road rider i felt somewhat out of place at the dive barn however it still looked awesome sitting behind my friend on their motorcycle as we pulled in i appreciated the outdoor atmosphere allowing people to smoke and enjoy themselves the beers were enjoyable and i had a tasty sandwich

on valentines day i brought my spouse to sea saw regrettably the atmosphere was lacking the cuisine was average and the charges were outrageous nonetheless the assistance provided was tolerable overall a very disheartening encounter

despite possessing a buy one get one free coupon my husband and i were anxious about eating at this place because of the critiques yet our breakfast for two amounted to only 431 including pancakes eggs blintzes among other things it fulfilled our needs and i am open to returning approach it with an open mind and see for yourself

incredible team members in customer service are really committed to helping you i was in quest of a hardtofind triwing screwdriver when maria as far as i recall her name managed to find someone knowledgeable about its whereabouts and swiftly got in touch with me id be happy to shop here once more

for our valentines date i took my better half to sea saw where the ambience was sorely missing resulting in ordinary fare and staggering prices although the staff service was satisfactory the whole ordeal proved to be severely dissatisfactory

with great anticipation my family and i planned to savor meals at curry garden however spotting the unhygienic kitchen conditions was disheartening its sad considering friends we eat with regularly spoke highly of this restaurant the least i can say is that i wasnt remotely impressed

travis and his crew displayed great professionalism and cooperation as we had the exterior of our house painted and are extremely satisfied with the end result we will surely employ gilberts painting for interior tasks in the future

with great expertise and effortless cooperation travis and his crew painted our homes exterior leaving us extremely satisfied with the completed work we wont hesitate to engage gilberts painting again when it comes to indoor tasks

nice small discovery with average meal options yet fantastic wait staff and a welcoming atmosphere keep you coming back i observed that most customers didnt require a menu as they were recognized by name and offered their regular orders – definitely a familylike vibe

i cant thank tracy and rip enough for aiding me in the financing process and choosing the perfect car suited for me i am thrilled with my latest purchase many thanks go out to the terrific team working at earnhardt buick gmc

cool little find average food but awesome servers and friendly environment draw you in i noticed nobody even needed a menu lol they were all greeted by name and asked if they wanted their usual family feel for sure

its amazing how bustling this barrer convenience store gets on friday evenings my visit was just a quick stop while biking so i couldnt properly judge the whole place yet the fantastic courtyard appeared to be an excellent area for gathering at night ill come back again and provide an updated review after exploring further
the notion of america doing away with walmarts seems fitting now
dont miss out on this unassuming gem nestled in the core area boasting friendly and respectful employees mouthwatering cuisine and it seems they even serve alcoholic concoctions as well
tedious and tasteless leisurely assistance youd have a superior experience at pastamore within the marketplace

as an authentic bikers hotspot i didnt belong since im not a biker but it looked great when i arrived as a passenger on my buddys motorbike the openair environment let people light up and have fun plus the beverages were enjoyable the sandwich i tried was rather tasty too

i recently opened it and im thrilled the success varies based on the stores location in the valley but im delighted to confirm that this is a great one both spam musubi and a hamburger steak plate lunch were delicious its fantastic to have one of these establishments on summerlins west side now and i will surely visit regularly

a true road riders dive barnnim not a road rider so i totally didnt fit in but i looked cool riding bitch on my friends motorcycle and pulling innni like the outdoorness of the place  that way people can smoke have a good time and the beers were good nni had a sandwhich it was pretty good as well
on my two trips to this venue the persistently discourteous workers who do not appear wellversed in client support were a prominent feature though the potato soup was passable

in summary terrible patron support means ill be searching for a new coffee joint in the future the barista had a pleasant demeanor but the supervisor with short blond hair appeared to possess some attitude troubles
i have a 4 day a week subscription to the arizona republic i never read it but it makes for perfect poop papers in and around my umbrella cockatoos cages
simply yearning for a heated serving of green tea while witnessing the rain pour down in a calm serene location far from the malls madness our seats provided us the scenery of the strip

in essence after encountering dreadful customer service i am determined to locate an alternative coffee spot in the future the barista was pleasant but it seemed that the supervisor with short blond hair harbored a certain negativity in her demeanor

as soon as you arrive the aroma of newly baked treats floods your senses and my top choices in this place are 1 egg pizza 2 red velvet bagel 3 peanut butter and jelly brioche and 4 utah peach tart without a doubt this has become my favorite destination for breakfast

just opened and im so excitednnit is hit or miss depending on the store in the valley but im glad to report that this is a good onennspam musubi and a hamburger steak plate lunch were very goodnnglad there is one on the west side of town in summerlin now   i will definately frequent this place

a decent eatery yet it didnt meet my anticipations id lean toward delmonico for a meat dish in this lodging the cuisine was alright but costly and not superior to dolminicos making the choice simple for me
working with travis and his team was effortless and highly professional our homes exterior paint job turned out superbly and well unquestionably engage gilberts painting for upcoming indoor projects

arrived at this location during a saturday night anticipating live entertainment commencing at 9 pm but disappointingly there was still no music an hour after that time the cuisine here is just passable id suggest heading over to boardwalk billies around the corner for a more satisfying experience and greater worth for the cost

for valentines day my better half and i dined at sea saw only to find that it severely lacked charm offered subpar dishes and charged us exorbitant fees despite this the personnel was relatively agreeable however the whole affair left much to be desired

i went here for lunch got a cold blue moon on tap i then went to the fish taco and cesar salad combo it was a great salad and probably the best fish tacos i have ever had these arent street tacos these are elegant tacos done high class taste and quality nni will be backfor sure
it appears that ending the presence of walmarts in america is overdue
a visit to pastamore at the marché would be a better option considering the monotonous and uninteresting slow service here
in essence poor customer relations will lead me to choose an alternative café in the future despite the friendly barista the short blondehaired manager exhibited a noticeable behavior problem

the restricted size options and disordered display made navigating this location difficult in order to find specific products the employees were amiable however im doubtful it would entice me to come back again

speedily experience this tuckedaway marvel situated right at the core the team is exceptionally amiable and wellmannered plus their dishes are mouthwatering and i presume they provide mixed drinks also

the lovely facility of the equidome boasts wellrun and organized cep horse shows featuring several arenas such as one indoor and a couple more sheltered spaces the cleanliness of the barns is noteworthy
